00030 #ifndef SC_CONSTANTS_H
00031 #define SC_CONSTANTS_H
00032 
00033 namespace sc_core {
00034 
00035 // Maximum number of bits for arbitrary precision arithmetic. If
00036 // defined, the arithmetic becomes faster. If not defined, the
00037 // arithmetic becomes slower and the precision becomes infinite.  It
00038 // is a good idea to define this constant as a multiple of
00039 // BITS_PER_DIGIT, which is defined in numeric_bit/sc_nbdefs.h.
00040 //#define SC_MAX_NBITS    510    // 17 * BITS_PER_DIGIT
00041 
00042 
00043 // deprecated in 1666-2005 and later, but kept for backwards compatibility
00044 //  - can be set by defining SC_OVERRIDE_DEFAULT_STACK_SIZE
00045 //  - defaults defined in sc_thread_process.cpp
00046 extern const int SC_DEFAULT_STACK_SIZE;
00047 
00048 
00049 #ifdef DEBUG_SYSTEMC
00050 const int SC_MAX_NUM_DELTA_CYCLES = 10000;
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 } // namespace sc_core
